doc.field: Series VII. Audiovisual and digital formats [RESTRICTED/ unprocessed]
Series VII. Audiovisual and digital formats [RESTRICTED/ unprocessed]

Series VII is currently unprocessed. This series contains audiovisual and digital format materials created by and collected by the WSF. According to legacy inventories, content includes athlete interviews, publicity and marketing material, and events footage. Formats include Betacam, U-matic, floppy disc, VHS, DVCPRO, CD, DVD, and zip disc. Materials date from approximately 1975-2012.
